author: Marisa Fernandez, Kim Hart
title: Parks aren't completely safe from the coronavirus
description: Closed businesses, home offices and schools amid the coronavirus pandemic has translated into an influx of outdoor recreation in parks, despite states' advice for people to stay home. Why it matters: So many people are visiting city parks to escape the stuck-…
content:
Closed businesses, home offices and schools amid the coronavirus pandemic has translated into an influx of outdoor recreation in parks, despite states' advice for people to stay home.
